column6: Journey back to the days of the 1990s, when two characters debuted who would change the face of comics…Cable & Deadpool! In this all-new tale, we learn of the pair's first meeting, well before New Mutants #98, as Cable and his soon-to-be X-Force race through the timestream to stop the reckless mercenary Deadpool before he destroys American history for good!
column8: | penciller (cover):Shane Davis | artist:Pepe Larraz | writer:Duane Swierczynski
